snippet: Fiji played its final match in Pool A by running in seven tries in a 47-15 win over Uruguay. Romania recorded the biggest comeback win at a World Cup with a 17-15 Pool D victory over Canada.
abstract: Fiji defeats Uruguay, 47-15, and Romania beats Canada, 17-15, at Rugby World Cup.
lead_paragraph: Fiji played its final match in Pool A by running in seven tries in a 47-15 win over Uruguay. Romania recorded the biggest comeback win at a World Cup with a 17-15 Pool D victory over Canada.

headline.main: Fiji and Romania Score First Wins of Rugby World Cup
